reviewText: This anime was for my cousin Edward, he found very funny and cool.

Beautifully done!  the characters all show a side of themselves we have yet to see and the ending is perfect for this season!  Val ghost is powerfull but with a fault that is shown in this last disc of the season.  it is also a stunning visual experiance as the worlds are expanded and space is ripped apart.  Please pick this up you will enjoy it!  I surely did.
